sections.title: Shareholders, directors and managers

fields.label: shdspacer
fields.infoText: Over the next four pages you will be asked the following:

fields.label: UKQuestion
fields.infoText: * How many of the people involved in the ownership, direction or management of your business are UK nationals?

fields.label: What we need to know about UK nationals
fields.infoText:
We need the persons name and national insurance number.

If they are a main shareholder we also need to know what percentage of shares they hold in the business

Once you have filled in those details you will need to indicate their role in the business from the options given, you may select more than one.

fields.label: Non-UKQuestion
fields.infoText: * How many of the people involved in the ownership, direction or management of your business are Non-UK nationals?

fields.label: What we need to know about Non-UK nationals
fields.infoText:
We need the persons name, date of birth and residential address.

If they are a main shareholder we also need to know what percentage of shares they hold in the business

Once you have filled in those details you will need to indicate their role in the business from the options given, you may select more than one.

fields.label: dataRequired
fields.infoText:
* Who are the owners or main shareholders for your business?
* Who are the owners or main shareholders involved in the day to day running of your business?
* Who are the board members or managers of your business?
* We could add the words: Who are the advisory board or board of directors members of your business? (listed as active at Companies House)
* Who is the person in charge of your company or exercising control over your companys management?

fields.label: Who should I include?
fields.infoText:
Include all people in the following roles that are UK nationals:

* Main Shareholder

* Main Shareholder involved in the day to day running of your business

* Board members or managers

* Advisory board or board of directors members (as listed at Companies House)

* Person in charge of your company or exercising control over your company's management?

### If you are not ready to send all your forms within this period, you need to save and come back later.

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
Job title
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm we’ve received this form

fields.infoText: By sending this form, you declare that the information you have provided is true and complete.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

You need to send us all of the relevant forms within **24 hours**.

If you do not send us these details in time, you will need to start a new application.

If you have sent us all the relevant details, we will tell you within 60 calendar days if your application has been successful.

If your application is unsuccessful we will tell you why.

**If you need help**

[Check the guidance](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/authorised-economic-operator-certification) to find out: 
- what you need to do while we process your application
- how to make changes to your application
- how to contact HMRC about your application
